title: Holidays & Events: New Year (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the New Year subcategory within Holidays & Events. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: I visit a shrine on New Year's Day.
cards.romaji: Gantan ni jinja e o-mairi ni iku.
cards.japanese: 元旦に神社へお参りに行く。

cards.english: I received a gift of New Year's money.
cards.japanese: お年玉をもらいました。

cards.english: To eat a New Year's dish on New Year's day.
cards.romaji: oshougatsu ni osechi ryouri wo taberu.
cards.japanese: お正月に御節料理を食べる。
